thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 67 of 625
thread.title: Alexis Padget

author: Alexis Padget
title: Alexis Padget
text: Love the styles, the quality of the items, and customer service has always been great. Would recommend Fabletics to anyone. Just make sure you pay attention to "skipping" your month, if in fact you would like to skip the charge. I learned that the hard way, a mistake which customer service didn't have to remove the charge for, but they were very gracious and extended me that favor. But now that I know to pay attention, it is very easy to "skip," I have since bought quite a few outfits from Fabletics and absolutely love them all.
